mapper.insert: INSERT INTO members (sns_type,sns_id,email,profile,nickname,address,gender,age,phone,created_id, created_at, updated_id, updated_at, role) VALUES (#{snsType}, #{snsId}, #{email}, #{profile}, #{nickname}, #{address}, #{gender}, #{age}, #{phone}, #{createdId}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedId}, #{updatedAt}, #{role})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM members WHERE sns_id = #{snsId} AND sns_type = #{snsType};
mapper.update: UPDATE members SET email = #{email}, profile = #{profile}, nickname = #{nickname}, address = #{address}, gender = #{gender}, age = #{age}, phone = #{phone}, deleted_at = #{deletedAt} WHERE id = #{id};
